vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the installation of playground equipment and an Independent Safety Audit with Whirlix Design Inc. through the Texas Association of School Boards (BuyBoard) for the Glen Meadow Park Playground Renovation located at 11800 Rosser Road - Not to exceed $189,814.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
